zipkin.server.brave

Class TracedStorageComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • zipkin.server.brave.TracedStorageComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Component, StorageComponent

    public final class TracedStorageComponent
extends Object
implements StorageComponent
    Storage component that traces each method invocation with Zipkin.

    Note: this inherits the StorageComponent.Builder#strictTraceId(boolean) from the delegate.
